title: Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['560g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons salt', '225g butter, softened', '225g margarine, softened', '300g caster sugar', '325g light brown soft sugar', '4 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons skimmed milk', '670g plain chocolate chips', '65g finely chopped crystallised stem ginger']
